title: Client is Freezing
body: So basically half the time I play a game with the new client, when I'm in the picks and bans, my client freezes and stars spazzing out.  https://goo.gl/photos/wAbstN7emxXidcjd8

replies.body: Is this happening on a mac?  This can happen if you have a 3rd party program running, or a graphics/hardware issue.  Disable any third party apps and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that was it.
